main event: A young child spotted a light-colored object moving swiftly and at low altitude near Alexandria, Virginia in October 1954.
interesting points: The object was only seen for a few seconds before going behind some trees.
The child was very frightened by the incident but was unable to provide a clear or detailed account.
The child's mother was also a witness but could not provide any additional details.
The report notes that it was very difficult to obtain information on this sighting.
The report form indicates the sighting lasted for 20 seconds and was a ground visual observation.
sighted object: a light-colored object moving swiftly and at low altitude
witnesses: a young child and their mother
